collectible.title: Amy's Pico Pico Hammer
collectible.text: Amy's Pico Pico Hammer that she can take out at any point for any battle at hand! When Amy isn't using her hammer, it is stored away in Hammerspace. It's just a replica, though, as Amy uses the real one to fight Dr Eggman.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Amy Rose.

collectible.title: Amy's Speical Photo
collectible.text: We seem to to have gotten quite close. I hope you'll accept this photo of me as a symbol of that. Just please don't show it to anyone else, it's for you only. <3
collectible.unlock: See all three of Amy's butt poses in one game.

collectible.title: Amy's Boots
collectible.subtitle: A pair of red boots with a white stripe at the top.
collectible.text: A pair of boots that Amy wears to the Inventory. They seem to gotten into your possession somehow... but Amy doesn't mind too much.
collectible.unlock: Hear Amy ask the table if they go shopping in a game.

collectible.title: Amy's Sweater
collectible.subtitle: A red sweater that Amy wears to the Inventory
collectible.text: A sweater that Amy wears to the Inventory. It seems to gotten into your possession, but Amy doesn't really mind it.
collectible.unlock: Have Amy lose. (You don't have to win, she just has to lose.)
